body_html: @alextp, last question: If I create c++ operation which will accept x variable and f tensor, will I be able to manipulate an execution of f depending on changes in x. In other words, will I be able to execute f tensor each time when I change x. Thanks!
body_text: @alextp, last question: If I create c++ operation which will accept x variable and f tensor, will I be able to manipulate an execution of f depending on changes in x. In other words, will I be able to execute f tensor each time when I change x. Thanks!
body: @alextp, last question: If I create c++ operation which will accept `x` variable and `f` tensor, will I be able to manipulate an execution of `f` depending on changes in `x`. In other words, will I be able to execute `f` tensor each time when I change `x`. Thanks!
